meanings.sent1: The offerer handed me a flyer with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The offerer at the store gave me a discount on my purchase.
meanings.sent3: The offerer jokingly pretended to sell me the moon.
meanings.sent4: The offerer of friendship extended a hand to the new student.
meanings.sent5: The offerer of help was always there when needed.

meanings.definition: A person who presents something for acceptance or rejection.
meanings.sent1: As the offerer of the job, she waited nervously for the candidate's response.
meanings.sent2: The offerer of the gift eagerly awaited the recipient's reaction.
meanings.sent3: The offerer of the challenge grinned mischievously, knowing it would be tough to refuse.
meanings.sent4: The offerer of the opportunity opened doors for many young artists.
meanings.sent5: The offerer of the deal made sure to highlight all its benefits.
